Slime.defeat_reward:
player.xp += 20
enemy.battle_info=[f'{enemy.name} have been defeated', 'You earn 20 XP']
if player.xp >= 100:
    player.levels += 1
    player.xp -= 100
    enemy.battle_info.append(f'Level Up!\nYour New Level is {player.levels}')
player.variables['is fighting slime'] = False
